main event: A light was observed near Flathead Lake, Montana on April 23, 1955.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as a light, but later became discernible as a light.
The object hovered briefly before banking and following the ground track of a vehicle at an altitude of around 2,000 feet.
The object traveled in a straight, parallel course in a southwesterly direction.
The sighting lasted for approximately 13 seconds.
The report concludes that the sighting was possibly a balloon, a probable aircraft, or probably astronomical.
